title: CMOS Analog Integrated Circuits and Systems II
description: Nonideal effects and their mitigation in high-performance operational amplifiers. Switched-capacitor circuit techniques: CMOS circuit topologies, analysis and mitigation of nonideal effects, and filter synthesis. Overview of CMOS samplers, data converters, and PLLs. Recommended preparation: Introduction to Digital Signal Processing (ECE 161A), Digital Signal Processing I (ECE 251A). Prerequisites: ECE 250 and ECE 264A; graduate standing.
